## Introduction














This document presents the overview, organization, and managerial and technical process associated to our smartphone Navigation app. Final product of our project is going to be a simple, yet useful, Navigation app for blind people. We call the resulting system HopeSOFT. In general, the system is able to be used by anyone, is for the needs of other people, is a smartphone app to help people who are in need navigating indoors, such as helping blind old people navigating around in campus’ buildings. 


Organization


In this section, we are going elaborate on process model and team organization.


Technical Persepective


In this section we are going to present technical presents related to the project. These include the tools, programming frameworks, and programming languages that we are going to use.


Bibliography


[1] Lawrence Chung, Advanced Requirement Engineering Syllabus, SE 6361, Section 001, Spring 2018.  http://utdallas.edu/~chung/RE/syllabus.htm


[2] Lamsweerde, Axel Van. Requirements engineering: from system goals to UML models to software specifications. Wiley, 2013.


[3] Li, Dongcheng, Ghanbari, Ali, Wang, Haoliang. Software Project Management Plan. Advanced Software Architecture and Design Course, The university of Texas at Dallas, 2017.
